sentences.en: a geological survey
sentences.cn: 地质勘察

sentences.en: A survey of 57 hospitals by Newchurch, a consultancy, reveals striking improvements.
sentences.cn: 一家名为纽彻奇的咨询公司对57家医院所作的调查显示改善十分明显。

sentences.en: a survey of modern English literature
sentences.cn: 现代英国文学概论

sentences.en: According to the survey, overall world trade has also slackened.
sentences.cn: 根据这项调查，世界贸易整体上也有所放慢。

sentences.en: Following is an outline of the survey findings.
sentences.cn: 以下是调查结果概要。

sentences.en: He sniffed the perfume she wore, then gave her a quick survey.
sentences.cn: 他闻了闻她身上的香水味，然后又飞快地打量了她一眼。

sentences.en: Its own estimate of three hundred tallies with that of another survey.
sentences.cn: 其估计数目300与另一项调查的结果相吻合。

sentences.en: Of the 100 companies surveyed, 10% had a turnover of £50 m to £99 m.
sentences.cn: 被调查的 100 家公司中，10% 的公司营业额在 5,000 万到 9,900 万英镑之间。

sentences.en: One survey revealed a threefold increasein breast cancer.
sentences.cn: 一项调查显示乳腺癌的发病率已是原来的3倍。

sentences.en: Our survey revealed that these allergies were mainly one-offs.
sentences.cn: 我们的调查显示这些过敏多为一次性反应。

sentences.en: She turned to survey her daughter’s pale face.
sentences.cn: 她转过头审视女儿苍白的面容。

sentences.en: The council conducted a survey of the uses to which farm buildings are put.
sentences.cn: 该委员会对农场建筑的用途进行了一个调查。

sentences.en: The results of the survey made fascinating reading.
sentences.cn: 调查结果令人读起来饶有兴味。

sentences.en: The survey claims loan companies prey on weak families already in debt.
sentences.cn: 这项调查声称信贷公司专对那些已经负债的弱势家庭下手。

sentences.en: The survey has a margin of error of 2.5%.
sentences.cn: 测量的误差幅度为2.5%。

sentences.en: The survey may cost at least £100 but is money well spent.
sentences.cn: 该调查可能要花费至少100英镑，但这钱花得值。

sentences.en: The survey's findings are a matter of great concern.
sentences.cn: 这次调查的结果备受关注。

sentences.en: There were many voyages to survey the ocean depths in the nineteenth century.
sentences.cn: 19 世纪有过多次勘测海洋深度的航行。

sentences.en: This very thorough survey goes back to 1784.
sentences.cn: 这个非常全面的调查可追溯到1784年。

sentences.en: Use the enclosed envelope to return your completed survey.
sentences.cn: 请用随信附上的信封将填好的调查表寄回。

sentences.en: We conducted a survey of parents in the village.
sentences.cn: 我们对这个村子的孩子父母作了一次调查。

sentences.en: We would welcome your views about the survey.
sentences.cn: 我们欢迎你就这项调查发表意见。

phrases.tran_cn: 简短的调查；简单的调查
详细调查；详细勘测；碎部测量
流行病学调查；列病学甸
n. 实地调查；实地考察
地质调查，地质勘探；地质测量；地质调查所
地质调查；地质勘查；地质测量
抽样检查；先行甸；样品鉴定

trans.tran_en: a set of questions that you ask a large number of people in order to find out about their opinions or behaviour
a set of questions that you ask a large number of people in order to find out about their opinions or behaviour

trans.tran_cn: 审察，测量，进行民意测验
trans.tran_en: to ask a large number of people questions in order to find out their attitudes or opinions

trans.tran_cn: 调查； 检视； 测量， 勘测； 全面审视， 概括论述
trans.tran_en: to ask a large number of people questions in order to find out their attitudes or opinions

trans.tran_cn: 环视，眺望；测量；勘定；检查；概述
trans.tran_en: a set of questions that you ask a large number of people in order to find out about their opinions or behaviour
